definition: diagram/picture/drawing/chart/map/CL:張|张[zhang1]/to plan/to scheme/to attempt/to pursue/to seek

sentences.english: Our sky chart shows the bright waxing gibbous moon and the planet Jupiter for around mid-evening tonight.
sentences.chinese: 今日的星圖展示了午夜前後明亮的凸月和木星。

sentences.english: It describes 4 deep-sky surveys since the discovering of Schmidt optics.
sentences.chinese: 簡要地介紹了十二種著名的巡天星圖。

sentences.english: In this paper, a three-star-star-map divi(?) posed based on the star pattern recognition.
sentences.chinese: 本文提出了基於星體模式識別的三星星圖劃分算法。

sentences.english: At night, it levitates rocks with psychic power and maps the position of the stars.
sentences.chinese: 晚上它用超能力使石頭漂起來，製造星圖。

sentences.english: The map of the solar system may be due for a little updating.
sentences.chinese: 太陽系的星圖應該做一個小小的升級。

sentences.english: The key importance in star map recognition is CCD star sensor.
sentences.chinese: CCD星敏感器的關鍵問題是星圖識別。

sentences.english: You can zoom in or out or scroll the map to position the track most effectively.
sentences.chinese: 你可以通過縮放和捲動星圖來觀察該軌跡。

sentences.english: The currrent planetary configuration offers a wonderful opportunity to get to know someone much better.
sentences.chinese: 今天的星圖將提供一個極好的機會更好的認識某人。

sentences.english: It helps to print out star charts on a large scale.
sentences.chinese: 這有助於大規模地印刷出星圖。

sentences.english: A spanning tree of optimal height is obtained in(n, k)-star graph networks.
sentences.chinese: 文章解決了組合星圖生成樹的構造問題。

sentences.english: Today's chart looks southeast on October evenings. That's where you'll find the constellation Cetus the Whale.
sentences.chinese: 今天星圖指向十月份鯨魚座所在的東南方向的夜空。

sentences.english: Newly-added external data catalogs are not available for use in existing maps.
sentences.chinese: 新增加的星表對已經打開的星圖不起作用。

sentences.english: The map of the solar system may nevertheless be due for some updating.
sentences.chinese: 太陽系的星圖該當做一個小小的進級。

definition: slave-owning society (precedes feudal society 封建社會|封建社会 in Marxist theory)
variant of 圖像|图像[tu2 xiang4]
Chinese treasure ship, a type of large sailing ship in the fleet of Ming dynasty admiral Zheng He 鄭和|郑和[Zheng4 He2]
